quoteText:
We–or vendors we have hired–use several common data collection technologies including cookies, pixel tags, and similar technologies.
These technologies are used to understand the activities and behaviors of our consumers and website visitors.
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
